Click on the pictures for a better view!
This was our first raid with a very specific goal in mind. Arathain had begun his quest for the Rain Caller (an Enchanted Trueshot Longbow, with a 200 range, along with other great properties). He soon discovered that he needed a lock of hair from a certain mermaid in Kedge Keep. We assembled our forces and were joined by some friendly folks from other guilds. We did not leave until every ranger there had gotten the lock of mermaid hair for their own Rain Caller quest! Thank you to everyone that came to give their support. We couldn't have done it without you.
Kedge Keep Raid
Rain Caller Stats
Rain Caller Quest
Not one member of our party was killed in the raid, and we all worked very well together. Again, our thanks go out to Bendi, Colcelot, Emerson, Rivin, Thamar, Thomm and Xbit who joined our Fellowship for the raid.
Thallus has submitted shots from a second raid into the Keep, as more Rangers went for the Mighty Rain Caller!
